language.entry: "I am but a mahcine... machine don't need love."
"I am but a mahcine... machine don't need love."
"I am but a mahcine... machine don't need love."
Loaded with assortment of deadly armaments and cover in heavy iron plating, a single Ironclad can outmatch for an entire army.

Clinking of the gears and steam of the boiler, when this deadly warmachine is on a march, nothing can stop it. Ironclad serve a formation as heavy front tank that can dish out devastating damages, but careful that there are chance where it might break down on its self.
A good lube job and some nuts tightening can go a long way in keeping a machine running.
A bit more to the left...Ah, now I can see better!
Just need to add on this thicc plate...
